page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: SCHOOL DINNERS BY RACHEL. A DINNER COSTS 58p PER DAY. I HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS. WE HAVE SMALL GREY DINNER TABLES WHICH SEAT UP TO FOUR PEOPLE.WE HAVE ONE DINNER LADY.WE LAY OUR OWN DINNER TABLES WITH CUTLERY AND THEN SAY 'GRACE'.WE HAVE SALAD ONCE A WEEK,THE REST OF THE FOOD IS DEEP FROZEN AND HEATED IN THE UPSTAIRS KITCHEN.MY FAVOURITE DINNERS ARE CORNISH PASTY,SCALLOPS,HOT POT AND CARROTS. THE ONES I DISLIKE ARE MUSHY PEAS,BROAD BEANS AND FISH. THE DESSERTS I LIKE ARE THE CRUMBLES AND SPONGES. THE ONE I HATE IS CHOCOLATE TART.THE DINNER LADY SERVES THE FOOD FROM A HOT TROLLEY.AFTER DINNER WE PLAY IN THE PLAYGROUND.ANOTHER LADY LOOKS AFTER US.
